resources.string: la app para mirar tus series y \npeliculas gratis!
Arthur Fleck, a party clown, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of crime and chaos.
Trapped on an isolated farm, Pearl must tend to her ailing father under the watch of her mother. Lusting for the glamorous life she has seen in movies, Pearl temptations and repressions collide.
Following her divorce, a woman faces numerous challenges as she aims to set up a successful business empire. However, she manages to overcome all the odds and fulfil her dream.
Chiron, a young African-American boy, finds guidance in Juan, a drug dealer, who teaches him to carve his own path.
A couple travel to Sweden to visit their friend rural hometown for midsummer festival, but what begins as an idyllic retreat quickly devolves into an increasingly violent and bizarre competition.
In the 1980s, an experiment by a weird scientist turns out to be faulty. It leads to his teenaged pal going back in time to the 1950s where he is forced to reunite the younger version of his parents.
